definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.english: "What are those good-smelling flowers with thorns called again?" he eventually asks.
sentences.chinese: 那種好聞又帶刺的花兒叫什麼名字來着？

sentences.english: Barbed these words, it was loudly stirring the eardrum.
sentences.chinese: 這些帶刺的話語，響亮地激盪着耳鼓。

sentences.english: These last words were uttered quietly but in a tone so sardonic.
sentences.chinese: 他說最後一句的時候語氣很鎮靜，可是話中帶刺。

sentences.english: The soft background of the cloud-filled blue sky contrasts well with the barbed wire foreground.
sentences.chinese: 藍天白雲與帶刺的防護網形成了鮮明的對比。

sentences.english: Giant loops of barbed wire lie rusting in the surf.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的一圈圈的帶刺鐵絲網在海浪中生鏽。

sentences.english: Holly, with its sharply pointed leaves, symbolised the thorns in Christ's crown-of-thorns.
sentences.chinese: 尖尖的冬青葉樹象徵着耶穌帶刺的冠冕。
西印度羣島的一種帶刺小喬木。

sentences.english: There were thorn bushes on the hillside.
A lot of dragons have giant scales and are spiny.
sentences.chinese: 多數的龍體型龐大，渾身帶刺。

sentences.english: Thorned not only beautiful roses, I also have my beauty of defense.
sentences.chinese: 帶刺不止是美麗的玫瑰，我也有我的防衛美。

sentences.english: One day Barry had been out playing and cut his arm on a barbed-wire fence.
sentences.chinese: 一天，巴里在外面玩，被帶刺的籬笆弄傷了他的胳膊。

sentences.english: What are those good-smelling flowers with thorns called again?
sentences.chinese: 那種好聞又帶刺的花兒叫什麼名字來着？

sentences.english: There's always a sting in his words.
Starfish's skin is covered with thorny bumps.
sentences.chinese: 海星的皮膚上都是帶刺的疙瘩。

sentences.english: Love stings like a bee but is sweet like honey when its not imitation.
sentences.chinese: 愛像帶刺的蜜蜂卻又似蜂蜜一般甜蜜。

definition: (of fruit etc) fresh/(of a person etc) full of life/healthy-looking/(of eyes) moist and bright/lustrous
to return a greeting/to send a gift in return
